segments.text: Rose , the weekend is coming . Let's discuss what we will do .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What about going to the zoo on Saturday and to the park on Sunday ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Sounds good . But on Saturday there's a football final .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Then , what shall we do on Sunday .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Let me see . We can visit the country . We haven't done that for such a long time .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Good idea . I'll go shopping in one of the department stores nearby . We'll go to the zoo and the park another time . After all , we can put that off .
segments.speaker: S2
